original_text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns, they put it upon his head, and a reed in his right hand: and they bowed the knee before him, and mocked him, saying, Hail, King of the Jews!
korean_text: 가시관을 엮어 그 머리에 씌우고 갈대를 그 오른손에 들리고 그 앞에서 무릎을 꿇고 희롱하여 이르되 유대인의 왕이여 평안할지어다 하며

sentences.original_text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns
they put it upon his head
and a reed in his right hand
and they bowed the knee before him
saying, Hail, King of the Jews!
